```{r echo=FALSE, out.width="150px", fig.align='right'}
knitr::include_graphics("assets/images/cross1.png") 


data <-
	readr::read_csv(
		'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/rfordatascience/tidytuesday/master/data/2020/2020-10-13/datasaurus.csv'
	) %>%
	mutate(category = case_when(
		dataset == "dino" ~ "A",
		dataset == "away" ~ "B",
		dataset == "h_lines" ~ "C",
		dataset == "v_lines" ~ "D",
		dataset == "x_shape" ~ "E",
		dataset == "star" ~ "F",
		dataset == "high_lines" ~ "G",
		dataset == "dots" ~ "H",
		dataset == "circle" ~ "I",
		dataset == "bulleyes" ~ "J",
		dataset == "slant_up" ~ "K",
		dataset == "slant_down" ~ "L",
		TRUE ~ "M"
	)) %>%
	select(category, x, y)
```
